banner_heading: Your certified eyelash artist, nail care & waxing studio in Z√ºrich
banner_description: Our boutique salon is located directly on Klusplatz. The offer includes eyelash extensions, eyelash lifting, nail care pedicures & manicures, nail modeling and waxing. All offers are tailored to your personal lookand beauty needs. We also offer eyelash products and give courses on eyelash extensions, nails & waxing.
step_heading: Your eyelash treatment is prepared in 3 simple steps
step1: Tell us what you like (and don't like)
step1_description: Talk to us and we will take care of the rest! Our artists will listen to you and create a personal style that suits you. This way we can make sure you get all the lengths and curves you need. This is crucial to achieve an optimal result.
step2_description: On your first visit we will record your reference details so next time we know exactly what you need. We can also take into account individual customer requests.
step3_description: Our eyelash artists will work during the session. you can sleep eat, chat or just listen to music. After 1 hour, maximum 1 hour 30 minutes you wake up fresh and can look forward to your new eyelashes. üòçüòçüòç
services_subtitle: Mina selects the best and highest quality products and recipes.
testimonials_heading: Once you try it, you can't go wrong
testimonial_text1: Inexpensive, personal touch and great taste, I really feel magical.
testimonial_text2: The wipsy is crazy good, it chooses the right for me every time. It's amazing not to worry about style anymore!
testimonial_text3: I've been going to Mina for years, even before she opened this salon, because they are the absolute best lash artists. There is no one I would trust with my lashes!
testimonial_text4: They are the kindest, sweetest and most talented beauticians in Switzerland hands down. I would give them more than five stars if I could. Perfect service everytime.
feature_text1: Our shop is open 6 days a week, including during the summer.
feature_text2: We only use local and organic products for your beauty and health.
feature_text3: Bookings only possible, drop-in times may vary. Since we mainly use bookings, we can fully focus on you during your appointment. There is no waiting time.
feature_text4: Do you have something urgent to do? Just cancel your booking. There are no additional costs for you as a valued customer.
contact_heading: Would you like to speak to us?
contact_text: Your feedback is very valuable. Your feedback is very valuable. If you have any questions, we, Hani & Honza the founders, will be happy to help you. We look forward to your feedback, questions and ideas. Just give us a call: 076 221 12 66
dont_miss_promotions2: To get the best offer and promotion of the year
